(Well, even if it does control her completly you can still save her. 
Find a way to kidnapp her, and than experiment to remove the chip. 
Boom, she's back to normal.)

Prebon sent a com to Ignatius.

"Where have you put the prisoner?"

"Cell A7."

Prebon escorted Spears to the brig wing and found A7. It didn't have 
bars; it was a steel door. They only way you could see was by opening 
a peep hole. He opened and looked at Striker. Still unconsiuos, bound 
in chains. He laughed.

"Come Spears, look! See how defeated your lover is!"
